title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a dynamic portfolio website to showcase my work and skills using Figma and React

title: Redis Server Clone
description: Developed a simplified version of Redis using Python to understand its core concepts. Implemented core Redis commands and replication of master to slave servers.

title: Human Resource Management System
description: Developed a responsive web-based HRMS using Django. Features include user authentication, role-based access control, and reporting, ensuring data security and compliance with industry standards.

title: Chatbot Song Recommender System
description: Created a chatbot using Python, Chatterbot, and Last.fm API to recommend songs based on user mood. Implemented sentiment analysis to gauge user mood from chat conversations.
